SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Actionable
Interface for GameObjects that can be actioned upon.
Avatar
A class that represents the avatar game object
Block
A class that represents a single block game object
ColorSupplier
Provides procedurally-generated colors around a pivot.
Constants
The Constants class contains all the constants used in the game.
Constants.ObjectLayer
The layers of the game objects
Flora
Handles the creation of trees within the game, implementing tree generation logic.
JumpObserver
A class that represents a jump observer object.
Leaf
Refactored Leaf class that represents a single leaf game object.
Log
A class that represents a single log game object
Night
Class that creates and adds a night overlay GameObject to the specified game layer.
NoiseGenerator
A class that helps us to create waving lines based on cyclic functions and its mostly used to generate an unequal terrain
NumericDisplay
A class that represents a numeric display game object
PepseGameManager
The main game manager for the Pepse game.
Round
Provides a method for rounding numbers to the closest multiple of a given factor.
Sky
Utility class for creating a sky object that spans the entire game window.
Sun
Class that creates and adds a sun GameObject to the specified game layer.
SunHalo
Class that creates and adds a sun halo GameObject to the specified game layer.
Terrain
Manages the creation and representation of game terrain, using Perlin noise for natural landscape generation.
TreeFruit
A class that represents a single tree fruit game object
